trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs object to specify the inertial behavior of a manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs 物件指定 inertial 操作的行為。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the inertial behavior for each type of manipulation separately by using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.TranslationBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.ExpansionBehavior%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.RotationBehavior%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用個別指定每一種操作的 inertial 行為<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.TranslationBehavior%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.ExpansionBehavior%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.RotationBehavior%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.RotationBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.ExpansionBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.TranslationBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each property is a type of object that represents the inertial behavior and in each case, you can specify the following: - The initial velocity of the inertia when it begins.
trans-unit.target: 每個屬性為類型的物件，代表 inertial 行為以及每個案例中，您可以指定下列項目:-慣性開始時的初始速度。

trans-unit.source: - The desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends.
trans-unit.target: 的處理慣性結束時所需的位置。

trans-unit.source: - The desired deceleration of the inertia.
trans-unit.target: 慣性-所需減速情形。

trans-unit.source: You typically specify either the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends or the desired deceleration of the inertia, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您通常會指定的操作，當慣性結束時所要的位置，或是所需的減速慣性，但非兩者。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 取消操作。

trans-unit.source: If the method succeeds, the default <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> sends previous touch events as mouse down, mouse move, or mouse up events to the element and future manipulation events do not occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，預設值<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>先前傳送觸控事件做為下、 滑鼠移動滑鼠或滑鼠向上事件的項目，而且未來的操作事件不發生。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the manipulation was successfully canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>已成功取消操作。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定擴充 inertial 移動的速度變慢的速率。

trans-unit.source: Use the ExpansionBehavior property to do the following: - Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ExpansionBehavior 屬性來執行下列動作:-指定慣性的初始速度，藉由設定開始時<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -指定的操作所需的擴充，當慣性結束藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -指定慣性所需的減速藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>

trans-unit.source: You typically set either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 您通常將<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>，但非兩者。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說︰ 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement
trans-unit.target: 擴充 inertial 移動的速度變慢的速率

trans-unit.source: Gets the rates of changes to the manipulation that occur before inertia starts.
trans-unit.target: 慣性啟動之前取得管理來進行的變更的率。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說︰ 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The rates of changes to the manipulation that occur before inertia starts.
trans-unit.target: 此操作來慣性啟動前所進行的變更的速率。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the container that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin*> property is relative to.
trans-unit.target: 取得容器<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin*>屬性是相對於。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說︰ 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The container that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin*> property is relative to.
trans-unit.target: 容器的<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin*>屬性是相對於。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the point from which the manipulation originated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定操作的起始點。

trans-unit.source: If more than one point of contact initiated the manipulation, the ManipulationOrigin property is the point between all of the points of contact.
trans-unit.target: 如果一個以上點起始之操作，ManipulationOrigin 屬性就會是連絡的所有連絡點之間的點。

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說︰ 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The point from which the manipulation originated.
trans-unit.target: 操作的起始點。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of objects that represents the touch contacts for the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示觸控連絡人來處理物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of objects that represents the touch contacts for the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 表示觸控連絡人來處理物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rate of slowdown of rotational inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旋轉 inertial 移動的速度變慢的速率。

trans-unit.source: Use the RotationBehavior property to do the following: - Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RotationBehavior 屬性來執行下列動作:-指定慣性的初始速度，藉由設定開始時<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -指定所要的旋轉的操作，當慣性結束藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -指定慣性所需的減速藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>

trans-unit.source: You typically set either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 您通常將<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>，但非兩者。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說︰ 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The rate of slowdown of rotational inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉 inertial 移動的速度變慢的速率。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the behavior of a manipulation during inertia.
trans-unit.target: 指定期間慣性操作的行為。

trans-unit.source: You typically do not need to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不需要呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs> instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs>改用。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The object that specifies the behavior of a manipulation during inertia.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定在慣性期間操作的行為。

trans-unit.source: parameter is .
trans-unit.target: parameteris .

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the rate of slowdown of linear inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定線性 inertial 移動的速度變慢的速率。

trans-unit.source: Use the TranslationBehavior property to do the following: - Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 TranslationBehavior 屬性來執行下列動作:-指定慣性的初始速度，藉由設定開始時<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -指定的操作所需的位置，藉由設定結束慣性時<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -指定慣性所需的減速藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>

trans-unit.source: You typically set either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 您通常將<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>，但非兩者。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The rate of slowdown of linear inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: 線性 inertial 移動的速度變慢的速率。
